show_name: Arifureta - From Commonplace to World's Strongest (TV)
other_title: ありふれた職業で世界最強 (Japanese)
plot: Hajime Nagumo and his entire high school class are transported to another world to be heroes in a war against other races, and all but Hajime are instantly gifted with special abilities and ridiculous strength. Hajime, on the other hand, is totally average, and as such the bullying he endured on Earth simply continues. Hajime has to struggle to survive in the depths of a deadly dungeon and learn to become a superhero without the gift of superpowers. (from manga)
